Today in Sutherland, you can catch some fun waves at Melvich and Strathy, both offering 3ft @9s WNW with a fresh 18 mph SSE wind. Tomorrow, the swell remains at 3ft @9s but shifts to a N direction, with winds picking up to 21 mph SE, making it a bit choppy. On the day after, the surf really lights up with 7ft @14s W and a moderate 16 mph SE wind, perfect for those looking for a solid session. Best: day after.
